name: ICE VORTEX 16402277
description:
ICE VORTEX

This work produced by Zydron, consists of generative 3D sculptures formed by random coordinates for each vertex, resulting in objects with unique polygonal geometric shapes. 

In this interactive NFT you can observe and interact by rotating, moving closer to, or further away from the sculpture. It is also possible to control the lights that illuminate the object with the position of the mouse. 

The soundtrack is a sonification of the sculptures and the notes played are generated by the coordinates of the vertices. But the sequence and duration of these notes is generated randomly creating infinite rhythmic combinations.

Controls:

use full screen for a better experience

click the play pause button at the top left to start the sound.

on the desktop, clicking with the mouse and dragging controls the rotation of the object, and the scroll bar zooms in and out of the object. On the keyboard the c key disables the cursor display for a better experience, and the v key re-enables it.

On the cell phone the pinch gesture zooms in, a two-finger click moves the object position, and a one-finger click rotates the object.

this is a gift for Suttan one of the best collectors I know!
PORTUGUÊS

Esse trabalho produzido por Zydron são esculturas generativas 3D formadas por coordenadas randômicas  para cada vértice, resultando em objetos com formas geométricas poligonais únicas. 

Nesse NFT interativo é possível observar e interagir rotacionando, se aproximando ou afastando da escultura. Também é possível controlar as luzes que iluminam o objeto com a posição do mouse. 

A trilha sonora é uma sonificação das esculturas e as notas tocadas são geradas pelas coordenadas dos vértices. Porém o encadeamento e duração dessas notas é gerado randomicamente criando infinitas combinações rítmicas.

Controles:
use a tela cheia para uma melhor experiência.

clique no botão play pause no topo a esquerda para iniciar o som.
